Incidents.complaint: He smashed my car and walked off like it was nothing!
It (he?) came out of knowhere and ate my cat! Then, he (it??) said my cat didn't have enough salt!
It bit and flipped me off when I tried to pet it
He left his webs all over my building. Who is supposed to clean this up?

Lawyers.name: Matthew Murdock
Lawyers.Desc: Matthew Murdock is determined to do whatever it takes to fight justice in the courtroom (and out of it)

Lawyers.name: Franklin Nelson
Lawyers.Desc: Mr. Nelson wins cases for both big and small clients. With or without his co-counsel Mr. Murdock, there is no challenge too great!

Lawyers.name: Jeri Hogarth
Lawyers.Desc: Ms. Hogarth has over 15 years of corporate and criminal legal experience. Likened to a shark, there are very few attorneys that can go toe to toe with her in courtroom
